original_text: diane lane shines in unfaithful . almost everything else is wan .
generated_text:
1. "george clooney's charisma can't save the mess that is the ides of march. almost everything else falls flat."
2. "emma stone's talent is wasted in the bland and unoriginal easy a. almost every other aspect is forgettable."
3. "tom cruise's presence isn't enough to elevate the dull and predictable edge of tomorrow. almost everything else is unremarkable."
4. "meryl streep's performance is overshadowed by the weak script and poor direction of the postman. almost every other element is subpar."
